channel.title: Problem with SMF Modification
channel.description:
Ok, I know that Moparisthebest installed this back in SMF 1.1 RC2, but he got it to work with SMF 1.1.1 RC3? The modification is the multiple Badges aka Stars mod. I know mopar uses it for the cup awards. These are the errors during installation:
Type Action Description 1. Execute Modification ./Sources/Load.php Test failed 2. Execute Modification ./Sources/ManageMembers.php Test failed 3. Execute Modification ./Themes/default/ManageMembers.template.php Test failed 4. Execute Modification ./Themes/default/languages/Modifications.english.php Test successful 5. Execute Code add_settings.php
Anyone know how to fix these?

item.title: Problem with SMF Modification
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I tried adding it by hand, but it just glitched up the template and then totally screwed over my forums. It was frustrating but a little amusing. I guess it is just because this is for RC2 and I have RC3. I asked because Mopar got it to work some how…

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with SMF Modification
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

If you get errors on mods that should be compatible with the forum smf version, just install them manually…

item.title: Problem with SMF Modification
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Ok, I know that Moparisthebest installed this back in SMF 1.1 RC2, but he got it to work with SMF 1.1.1 RC3? The modification is the multiple Badges aka Stars mod. I know mopar uses it for the cup awards. These are the errors during installation:

Type Action Description

  1. Execute Modification ./Sources/Load.php Test failed
  2. Execute Modification ./Sources/ManageMembers.php Test failed
  3. Execute Modification ./Themes/default/ManageMembers.template.php Test failed
  4. Execute Modification ./Themes/default/languages/Modifications.english.php Test successful
  5. Execute Code add_settings.php

Anyone know how to fix these?

Read full topic
